description: Biology of tropical and subtropical Indo-Pacific marine invertebrates. We explore structural, functional & life history adaptations of invertebrate body plans to the marine environment to explain ecological and evolutionary patterns of diversity. Quota 50 (in total). All enquiries for permission to enrol to be addressed to biology.enquiries@uq.edu.au. Preference given to third year students who have completed BIOL2204 and who are Marine major students. Students in other majors will be considered on merit if there is space.
